verses.text_plain: And there was a man of mount Ephraim, whose name was Micah.
verses.verse_html: 1And there was a man of mount Ephraim, whose name was Micah.

verses.text_plain: And he said unto his mother, The eleven hundred shekels of silver that were taken from thee, about which thou cursedst, and spakest of also in mine ears, behold, the silver is with me; I took it. And his mother said, Blessed be thou of the Lord, my son.
verses.verse_html: 2And he said unto his mother, The eleven hundred shekels of silver that were taken from thee, about which thou cursedst, and spakest of also in mine ears, behold, the silver is with me; I took it. And his mother said, Blessed be thou of the Lord, my son.

tokens.text: from thee, about which thou cursedst

verses.text_plain: And when he had restored the eleven hundred shekels of silver to his mother, his mother said, I had wholly dedicated the silver unto the Lord from my hand for my son, to make a graven image and a molten image: now therefore I will restore it unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 3And when he had restored the eleven hundred shekels of silver to his mother, his mother said, I had wholly dedicated the silver unto the Lord from my hand for my son, to make a graven image and a molten image: now therefore I will restore it unto thee.

verses.text_plain: Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred shekels of silver, and gave them to the founder, who made thereof a graven image and a molten image: and they were in the house of Micah.
verses.verse_html: 4Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred shekels of silver, and gave them to the founder, who made thereof a graven image and a molten image: and they were in the house of Micah.

tokens.text: and they were in the house

verses.text_plain: And the man Micah had an house of gods, and made an ephod, and teraphim, and consecrated one of his sons, who became his priest.
verses.verse_html:
5And the man Micah had an house of gods, and made an ephod, and teraphim, and consecrated one of his sons, who became his priest.
 consecrated: Heb. filled the hand

footnotes.body_html: consecrated: Heb. filled the hand

verses.text_plain: In those days there was no king in Israel, but every man did that which was right in his own eyes.
verses.verse_html: 6In those days there was no king in Israel, but every man did that which was right in his own eyes.

verses.text_plain: And there was a young man out of Bethlehemjudah of the family of Judah, who was a Levite, and he sojourned there.
verses.verse_html: 7And there was a young man out of Bethlehemjudah of the family of Judah, who was a Levite, and he sojourned there.

tokens.text: And there was a young man

verses.text_plain: And the man departed out of the city from Bethlehemjudah to sojourn where he could find a place: and he came to mount Ephraim to the house of Micah, as he journeyed.
verses.verse_html:
8And the man departed out of the city from Bethlehemjudah to sojourn where he could find a place: and he came to mount Ephraim to the house of Micah, as he journeyed.
 as he: Heb. in making his way

footnotes.body_text: as he: Heb. in making his way
footnotes.body_html: as he: Heb. in making his way

verses.text_plain: And Micah said unto him, Whence comest thou? And he said unto him, I am a Levite of Bethlehemjudah, and I go to sojourn where I may find a place.
verses.verse_html: 9And Micah said unto him, Whence comest thou? And he said unto him, I am a Levite of Bethlehemjudah, and I go to sojourn where I may find a place.

verses.text_plain: And Micah said unto him, Dwell with me, and be unto me a father and a priest, and I will give thee ten shekels of silver by the year, and a suit of apparel, and thy victuals. So the Levite went in.
verses.verse_html:
10And Micah said unto him, Dwell with me, and be unto me a father and a priest, and I will give thee ten shekels of silver by the year, and a suit of apparel, and thy victuals. So the Levite went in.
 a suit: or, a double suit, etc: Heb. an order of garments

tokens.text: with me, and be unto me a father

footnotes.body_text: a suit: or, a double suit, etc: Heb. an order of garments
footnotes.body_html: a suit: or, a double suit, etc: Heb. an order of garments

verses.text_plain: And the Levite was content to dwell with the man; and the young man was unto him as one of his sons.
verses.verse_html: 11And the Levite was content to dwell with the man; and the young man was unto him as one of his sons.

verses.text_plain: And Micah consecrated the Levite; and the young man became his priest, and was in the house of Micah.
verses.verse_html: 12And Micah consecrated the Levite; and the young man became his priest, and was in the house of Micah.

verses.text_plain: Then said Micah, Now know I that the Lord will do me good, seeing I have a Levite to my priest.
verses.verse_html: 13Then said Micah, Now know I that the Lord will do me good, seeing I have a Levite to my priest.
